27.eng-name: Chapters on Righteousness And Maintaining Good Relations With Relatives
27.ara-name: كتاب البر والصلة عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Ibn Abbas narrated that the Messenger of Allah said:"Do not argue with your brother, do not joke with him, and do not make a promise, only to not fulfill it

chapter.eng-name: What Has Been Related About Arguing
